#summary Integrate your GWT applications with handwritten or third-party !JavaScript using JavaScript Native Interface (JSNI)

=Interoperability=

Often, you will need to integrate GWT with existing handwritten !JavaScript or with a third-party !JavaScript library.  Occasionally you may need to access low-level browser functionality not exposed by the GWT class API's.  The [DevGuideJavaScriptNativeInterface JavaScript Native Interface (JSNI)] feature of GWT can solve both of these problems by allowing you to integrate !JavaScript directly into your application's Java source code.

==Specifics==

[DevGuideJavaScriptNativeInterface JavaScript Native Interface (JSNI)]
Mix handwritten !JavaScript into your Java source code.
